product_name: Ocean Kayak Malibu Two XL Sit-On-Top Kayak
long_description: A highly stable recreational kayak that you can paddle solo, tandem, or with a small child, the Ocean Kayak Malibu Two XL Sit-On-Top Kayak offers supersized fun for the whole family. Highly durable linear polyethylene construction with molded-in graphics offers years of service. Ample rocker enhances turning, and deep keel helps you paddle in a straight line. Overlapping foot wells combined with a small center seat allow 2 people to sit comfortably with a small child or pet; padded seats adjust for comfort. If the family is busy, you can paddle the Malibu Two XL alone from the center seat. Includes self-bailing scupper holes, accessory eyelets, drain plug, skid plate and paddle keepers. To block water flooding through scupper holes, Scupper Stoppers are available (sold separately); the Malibu Two XL requires 4 medium Scupper Stoppers. Weighs approximately 68 lbs.
short_description: A highly stable recreational kayak that you can paddle solo, tandem, or with a small child, the Ocean Kayak Malibu Two XL Sit-On-Top Kayak offers supersized fun for the whole family.
